name: Harmony
challengeDesc: We are all familiar with how NFTs can prove ownership and have been used to show membership in a club or ownership of a digital image. But that is not all. What ELSE can an NFT do? How can you use NFTs in a metaverse? What other rights can be imbedded into an NFT? Can you solve joint ownership of an NFT? An NFT timeshare?
benefitIntro: Our team has integrated the 1inch adapter containing isValidSignature, getMakerAmount (which calculates return amount based on DEX (“getReturn” function) and transferFrm (which triggers swaps and sends to takerAddress).
benefit1: What other rights can be imbedded into an NFT?
benefit2: Can you solve joint ownership of an NFT?
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with 1inch.
